content: This is a further digesting of some of the contents of #9145. It adds some lemmas, and also necessarily moves some existing ones and refactors, due to a requirement of a slightly different set of dependencies (which has improved proofs later).
I don't think it will be a straightforward review, but I don't think it should be too bad. I've tried to limit the scope as much as possible.

Incidentally, I think it is possible that these lemmas are misdescribed in the existing documentation, and, as simp lemmas, are the wrong way round - but I haven't changed anything on that front. I will leave that to reviewers. However, compare rev_succAbove.
